1.title: Start It Up
1.plot: Best friends Yash and Neel audition for the dance show, Shake It Up, Mumbai. They both do a spotlight dance and Yash makes it in. Unfortunately, Neel gets stage fright and doesn't make it in. The following morning, Yash decides not to participate since Neel did not make it. Neel forces him to show up anyway as it has been their lifelong dream to dance on Shake It Up, Mumbai. He accompanies Yash to the studio and just when Yash is about to go on he handcuffs himself to Neel so they both have to dance during the filming of the show. The host, Shekhar Grover, sees them ...

2.title: Hook It Up
2.plot: Neel and Yash invite Dheeraj to videotape them for a school project and he overhears Shekhar Grover deciding whether or not to fire two dancers. Fearing that it could be Neel and Yash, he shows them the footage and the two set out to prove to Shekhar that they should get as much recognition as the dancers who have been on the show before. Little that they know that they weren't the last ones hired and that Shekhar wasn't planning to take them off the show. Meanwhile, Jay teaches Ayush how to do some dance steps to impress an older girl.

3.title: Give It Up
3.plot: Neel and Yash decides to do a marathon in Shake It Up so Neel can get the Spotlight Dance and Yash can donate money to a retirement home. Neel gets energy drinks because the rules are to keep dancing on the floor without falling down. However Ayush drinks all of the energy drinks and becomes energetic and that Yash and Neel are too tired stopping him. At the marathon, they nearly feel sleepy but thanks to Dheeraj, who gave them lightning pants, they win the marathon.

7.title: Kick It Up
7.plot: After Neel ruins Dheeraj's and Yash's dates at the movie theater, Dheeraj points out that they both are too joined together like Manjot and Mandeep. So, Neel decides to be separated from him for a little while. After some desperate calls to some old friends, he runs into Yash and sees that he has already made new friends at his karate class and Neel is afraid to lose his best friend. Meanwhile, Ayush enlists his new friend, Vishal, to join his karate class to help fend off bullies.

8.title: Age It Up
8.plot: When Neel and Yash get to dance with teen sensation Sasha, they go to her apartment for rehearsal and discover that she is married with her manager Bobby. Neel takes a picture of there photo hanging in the apartment and tries to send it to his mom, thinking that she may have a solution to the problem, but accidentally sends it to everyone on his contact list. Meanwhile, Jay tries to make Manjot more "hip", before he is rejected by a girl.

22.title: Beam It Up
22.plot: Yash and Neel go to a Halloween party at the Shake It Up studio. Meanwhile, Ayush suspects that his new neighbor Hari, is an alien and has a dream that he and Vishal have been abducted.

imdb.plot outline: Revolves around the misadventures of best friends Neel (Neeladri) Walia and Yash (Yashpal) Mehta, two confident and energetic 13-year-olds who are skilled dancers and are on the threshold of taking their steps into the world of professional dancing.
imdb.title: Shake it Up
plot: Revolves around the misadventures of best friends Neel (Neeladri) Walia and Yash (Yashpal) Mehta, two confident and energetic 13-year-olds who are skilled dancers and are on the threshold of taking their steps into the world of professional dancing.
